config.configDesc: (Moraš pritisnuti 'Spremi i ponovno pokreni' da bi neke promjene stupile na snagu)
config.extremeGamesDesc: Dozvoljava uključivanje, stvaranje i izmjenjivanje filtera ekstremnih oznaka za kontrolu djeci neprikladnog sadržaja.
config.hideExtremeScreenshotsDesc: Skriva snimke zaslona ekstremnog sadržaja, mogu se otkriti klikom na njihov prozorčić.
config.fancyAnimationsDesc: Enable fancy animations in the launcher.
config.searchLimitDesc: Limit the number of results returned in any search
config.enableEditingDesc: Omogućava uređivanje igara i dodatnih aplikacija. Također prikazuje kartice vezane za uređivanje.
config.symlinkCurationDesc: Uses symbolic links to test curations rather than copying files. Faster and supports MAD4FP. Admin rights required.
config.onDemandImagesDesc: Preuzmi i spremi nedostajuće logotipe i snimke zaslona čim su potrebni.
config.currentLanguageDesc: Which language the launcher will use primarily.
config.fallbackLanguageDesc: Which language to use in place of an incomplete current language.
config.flashpointPathDesc: Putanja do Flashpoint mape (može biti relativna)
config.randomLibrariesDesc: Libraries to use for Random Picks on the home page.
config.nativePlatformsDesc: Use Native versions of these platforms. (If not available it will use Wine)
config.tagFilterGroupsDesc: These groups will filter suggestions and games out of search results
config.appPathOverridesDesc: Overrides the application path on the left with the one on the right when launching games.
config.useCustomTitleBarDesc: Use a custom title bar at the top of this window.
config.themeDesc: ID of the theme to use.
config.logoSetDesc: ID of the logo set to use.
config.showDeveloperTabDesc: Prikazuje "Programer" karticu. Ovo je najvjerovatnije jedino korisno za programere i kustose.
config.serverDesc: Which Server Process to run at launcher startup.
config.metadataServerHostDesc: Host of a metadata server. Used for syncing new and updated game info to the launcher.
config.noExtensionsLoaded: No Extensions loaded, Install them to '{0}'

home.hallOfFameInfo: Only want the best of the best? Check out the {0}!
home.allGamesInfo: Looking for something to play? View {0}.
home.allAnimationsInfo: Just want something to watch? View {0}.
home.configInfo: Želiš li nešto promijeniti? Idi na {0}.
home.notes: Don't forget to read the manual if you're having issues.

developer.developerDesc: This is where all the useful developer tools will go.
developer.checkMissingImagesDesc: List all games without a thumbnail or screenshot
developer.checkGameIdsDesc: List all games with duplicate or invalid IDs
developer.checkGameTitlesDesc: List all games with duplicate titles on the same platform
developer.checkGameFieldsDesc: List all games with empty fields (of the fields that should not be empty)
developer.checkPlaylistsDesc: Izlistaj sve playliste sa dupliranim ili nevažećim ID, ili koje imaju unose sa nedostajućim, nevažećim ili dupliranim ID
developer.checkGameFileLocationDesc: List all games with launch commands that can not be parsed into file paths (this is related to the 'Open File Location' function, not launching the game)
developer.checkMissingExecMappingsDesc: List all unique execs for win32, linux and darwin which are missing an exec mapping
developer.renameImagesTitleToIdDesc: Find all game images with the games title in their filename and rename them to use its ID instead
developer.renameImagesIdToTitleDesc: Find all game images with the games ID in their filename and rename them to use its title instead
developer.createMissingFoldersDesc: Find all missing folders in the Flashpoint folder structure and create them
developer.importLegacyPlatformsDesc: Imports Legacy Platforms from `Data/Platforms/` - WARNING: Will overwrite conflicting games
developer.fixPrimaryAliasesDesc: Add a primary alias to any tags that are missing one
developer.fixCommaTagsDesc: Splits tags with commas into many tags and applies them to all applicable games
developer.exportTagsDesc: Creates a file full of tags and tag categories that can be used by 'Import Tags'
developer.importTagsDesc: Imports Tags from an file created by 'Export Tags'
developer.migrateExtremeGamesDesc: Uklanja 'Extreme' na bilo kojoj igri i zamjenjiva je oznakom 'LEGACY-Extreme'
developer.massImportGameDataDesc: Mass imports Game Data packs, attempting to match their filename to a games UUID.

about.flashpointDesc: The preservation project this launcher was built for, that aims to be an archive, museum and playable collection of web-based Internet games.
about.flashpointLauncherDesc: Desktop aplikacija otvorenog koda koji se koristi za pregledavanje, upravljanje i igranje igara iz Flashpoint projekta.
about.licenseInfo: MIT (Read the file named 'LICENSE' for more information)

browse.dropImageHere: Drop an image here to add it
browse.clickToSelectGame: Click on a game to select it.
browse.dropGameOnLeft: Dovuci igru na ovoj playlisti u {0} da bi je dodao.
browse.setFlashpointPathQuestion: Have you set the path to the {0} at the {1} page?
browse.noteSaveAndRestart: Napomena: Moraš pritisnuti {0} da bi promjene stupile na snagu.
browse.noGameMatchedDesc: No game title matched your search.
browse.noGameMatchedSearch: Try searching for something less restrictive.

curate.importAllDesc: Import all curations that are currently loaded
curate.deleteAllDesc: Delete all curations that are currently loaded
curate.openCurationsFolderDesc: Open the Curations folder in explorer
curate.openExportsFolderDesc: Open the default Exports folder containing your exported curations.
curate.openImportedFolderDesc: Open the default Imported curations folder containing your imported curations.
curate.newCurationDesc: Creates a new curation with a unique folder
curate.loadMetaDesc: Load one or more Curation meta files
curate.loadArchiveDesc: Load one or more Curation archives
curate.loadFolderDesc: Load one or more Curation folders
curate.scanNewCurationFoldersDesc: Scans for curations that have been added after the initial scan
curate.heading: Zaglavlje
curate.deleteCurationDesc: Delete this curation (Files can not be recovered)
curate.noLaunchCommand: 'Launch Command' is a required field. Please fill it in before importing.
curate.invalidLaunchCommand: 'Launch Command' does not fit these URL requirements:
curate.releaseDateInvalid: 'Release Date' must follow YYYY-MM-DD (month and day are optional).
curate.unusedApplicationPath: 'Application Path' has an unused value. Make sure it's spelled correctly!
curate.unusedTags: The following tags are not present on any other game. Are they correct?
curate.unusedPlatform: 'Platform' has an unused value. Make sure it's spelled correctly!
curate.nonExistingLibrary: 'Library' is not the name of an existing library! (Default will be used)
curate.nonContentFolders: Non-Content folders found in Curation folder. Are they supposed to be there?
curate.noTags: There are no tags on this curation.
curate.unenteredTag: The Tags text field hasn't been submitted.
curate.noLogo: There is no logo on this curation.
curate.noScreenshot: There is no screenshot on this curation.
curate.ilc_nonExistant: Point to an existing file in your curation's 'content' folder.
curate.documentStatus: Notes must document changes and missing content for Hacked / Partial games

playlist.saveDesc: Spremi učinjene izmjene i prekini uređivanje
playlist.discardDesc: Odbaci učinjene izmjene i prekini uređivanje

misc.deleteAllBlankImages: Izbriši SVE {0} slike za ovu igru

dialog.phpNotFound:
PHP nije pronađen na ovoj putanji. Je li instaliran?
Možda ćeš se sustresti sa neočekivanim i oštećenim ponašanjem bez njega.
dialog.wineNotFound:
Wine nije instaliran, ali je potreban za pokretanje ove igre.
Molim vidi "Linux Support" članak na wikiju za više informacija.
dialog.flashpointPathNotFound: Flashpoint mapa nije postavljena ili je nevažeća. Želih li odabrati mapu u kojoj bi instalirao sada?
dialog.importedPlaylistAlreadyExists: Uvezena playlista već postoji s istim imenom! - '{0}'
dialog.selectFileToExportMeta: Odaberi datoteku u kojoj će se sačuvati metapodatak
dialog.selectFolderToExportMetaAndImages: Odaberi mapu u kojoj će se sačuvati metapodatci i slike
dialog.exportedAlreadyExistsYesNo:
Jedna ili više izvezenih datoteka već postoji.
 Želiš li ih zamjeniti?
dialog.selectFileToExportPlaylist: Odaberi mapu u kojoj će se sačuvati playlist
dialog.dataRequiredDesc:
Moraš instalirati ovu nadogradnju na početnom zaslonu prije nego što budeš u mogućnosti koristiti pokretač.

Želiš li to učiniti sada?
dialog.verifyPathSelection: Buduće nadogradnje će također biti instalirane ovdje. Je li ovo točno?
dialog.restartToApplyUpgrade:
Ova nadogradnja neće biti u primjeni dok se aplikacija ne pokrene ponovno.
Želiš li to učiniti odmah?
dialog.areYouSureDelete: Jesi li siguran oko brisanja ovog unosa?
dialog.areYouSurePlaylistRemove: Jesi li siguran da želiš izbrisati ovaj unos sa playliste?
dialog.uploadPrivacyWarning:
Ovo će učiniti tvoje zapise dostupnim javnošću.
Poveznica će se kopirati u međuspremnik.

Da li si siguran?
dialog.overwriteFileMessage: Datoteka sa istim imenom već postoji. Želiš li je zamjeniti ovom?
dialog.deleteGame: Izbrisati ovu igru? Radnja se ne može poništiti.
dialog.deleteGameData: Izbrisati sve podatke igre? Radnja se ne može poništiti.
dialog.unableToUninstallGameData: Unable to delete data pack. Is it in use? Try restarting the launcher.
dialog.unableToDeleteGame: Unable to delete game. Is it in use? Try restarting the launcher.
dialog.aFewMinutes: Ovo bi moglo potrajati nekoliko minuta.
dialog.importCurationWithWarnings: Import this curation? There are still warnings present.
dialog.errorImportingCuration: Error import curation '{0}', check logs page for details.
dialog.exportCurationWithWarnings: Export Curation even though it has Warnings?

upgrades.infinityDesc: Potrebne datoteke. Dodaje podršku za Flash igre.
upgrades.techDesc: Dodaje podršku za sve ostale tehnologije - Shockwave, Unity, Java, HTML5, itd.
upgrades.screenshotsDesc: Dodaje logotip za pregled u rešetki i snimke zaslona za sve igre.
